metadata.title: CVE-2021-26117 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The optional ActiveMQ LDAP login module can be configured to use anonymousaccess to the LDAP server. In this case, for Apache ActiveMQ Artemis priorto version 2.16.0 and Apache ActiveMQ prior to versions 5.16.1 and 5.15.14,the anonymous context is used to verify a valid users password in error,resulting in no check on the password.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-26117` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

activemq - 5.15.8-2~18.04.1~esm1
libactivemq-java - 5.15.8-2~18.04.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: activemq package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.8-2~18.04.1~esm1').
